body:
# jUIRTE

A really simple (and light) Rich Text Editor (wysiwyg) for Jquery UI

## Featuring:
* Buttons & Buttonsets
* Expandable
* Cross-browser
* Very,very,very,very SMALL!

## Example 
```
$(document).ready(function(){ 
 $("#myEditor").wysiwyg();
});
```
## License
LGPL - use it how you want!
name: jUIRTE
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
